Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have a 7-0 advantage over Sri Lanka in ODI World Cup matches
Sri Lanka won the recent fixture between the sides at the Asia Cup
Pakistan have two points and a win in the World Cup, while Sri Lanka remain unadorned at the points table
Sri Lanka might consider writing off their bowling performance against South Africa and starting over
Charith Asalanka led Sri Lanka to victory in a knockout game against Pakistan in the Asia Cup last month
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hyderabad has begun to feel like home for Pakistan
Some cloud cover is expected in Hyderabad during the game, but no rain
The pitch should be conducive to big scores
Others: Imam-ul-Haq's runs appear to have tapered off as well
Fakhar Zaman's poor form has got the most attention
Charith Asalanka is one of the best middle-overs batters in the world at the moment
